gnat.retrieval
Class ResourceHelper

java.lang.Object
  gnat.retrieval.ResourceHelper

public class ResourceHelper
extends java.lang.Object

Provides methods to access internet URLs.

 ResourceHelper rh = new ResourceHelper("true", "my.proxy.com", "3128");
 
 String webpage = rh.getURLContent("http://sun.java.com");
 // .. do something with the content ..

Author:
Conrad Plake, Joerg Hakenberg, Marcus Pankalla

ResourceHelper

public ResourceHelper()
Constructs a new ResourceHelper and (re)sets the system properties. See resetSystemProperties.

ResourceHelper

public ResourceHelper(boolean resetSystemProperties)
Constructs a new ResourceHelper and (re)sets the system properties if resetSystemProperties is set to true.

Parameters:
resetSystemProperties -

ResourceHelper

public ResourceHelper(java.lang.String proxySet,
                      java.lang.String proxyHost,
                      java.lang.String proxyPort)
Constructs a new ResourceHelper according to the given settings for a proxy.

Parameters:
proxySet - - either string "true" or "false"
proxyHost - - hostname of IP of the proxy
proxyPort - - port number where to contact the proxy
Method Detail

getURLContent

public java.lang.String getURLContent(java.lang.String URL)
Opens an HttpURLConntection to the specified URL and gets the content located there.

Parameters:
URL - the URL to fetch
Returns:
String - the URL's content

getURLContent

public java.lang.String getURLContent(java.lang.String URL,
                                      int readTimeOut)
Opens an HttpURLConntection to the specified URL and gets the content located there.

Parameters:
URL - the URL to fetch
readTimeOut - connection time out
Returns:
String - the URL's content

resetSystemProperties

public void resetSystemProperties()
Resets the system properties and overwrites them with the values currently set for this ResourceHelper. This overwrites proxySet, proxyHost, proxyPort, httpclient.useragent, http.referer, http.agent.
It might be necessary to call this method whenever other classes/programs set other values.

setDirectConnection

public void setDirectConnection()
Clears all proxy settings, so that a direct connection to the internet can be established.

setProxySet

public void setProxySet(java.lang.String set)
Toggles the system parameter proxySet, either "true" (default) or "false". This tells the system whether to use a proxy or not. Set the proxy using setProxyHost(String) and setProxyPort(String).

Parameters:
set - - either true or false, as a String

setProxyHost

public void setProxyHost(java.lang.String host)
Sets a new value for the system property proxyHost. Might be a URL, IP, or "localhost", depending on your systems environment.

Parameters:
host - - the new proxy host, a URL or IP

setProxyPort

public void setProxyPort(java.lang.String port)
Sets a new value for the system property proxyPort, corresponding to proxyHost.

Parameters:
port - - the new proxy port

getProxySet

public java.lang.String getProxySet()
Returns the current setting for the system property proxySet.

Returns:
current setting

getProxyHost

public java.lang.String getProxyHost()
Returns the current setting for the system property proxHost.

Returns:
current proxy host

getProxyPort

public java.lang.String getProxyPort()
Returns the current setting for the system property proxyPort.

Returns:
current proxy port
